word: Let those who have had success in the circulation of the Signs and Review remember that the Watchman also has a work to do. It will accomplish much good if it is given an opportunity to do its appointed work in all parts of the world. Its field is wherever subscribers can be found for it. [WATCHMAN MAGAZINE HAS BEEN PUBLISHED UNDER ONE NAME OR ANOTHER SINCE 1891. IN 1946, THE NAME WAS CHANGED TO OUR TIMES. AND IN MAY, 1951, TO THESE TIMES. AT THE PRESENT TIME THESE TIMES IS ADVERTISED AND DISTRIBUTED AROUND THE WORLD.]--SpT, Misc. 89-91.
